QueryDefinition.Query: SELECT ch.person_id as PersonId, hvid, enc_dt, hv_enc_id, diag_cd, diag_cd_qual, case when diag_cd_qual = '02' OR diag_cd_qual IS NULL and hv_diag_dt >= '2015-10-01' then '10' when diag_cd_qual = '01' OR diag_cd_qual IS NULL and hv_diag_dt < '2015-10-01' then '9' end as icd_ver, diag_prov_id, diag_stat_desc, case upper(diag_stat_desc) when 'PRIMARY DIAGNOSIS OF' then 4033240 when 'CONSIDERED' then 4033240 when 'DISCUSSION OF' then 4033240 when 'PROBABLE' then 4163351 when 'POSSIBLE' then 4163351 when 'WORKING DIAGNOSIS OF' then 4208085 when 'SECONDARY DIAGNOSIS OF' then 4309641 when 'ADMISSION DIAGNOSIS OF' then 4203942 when 'REFERRAL DIAGNOSIS OF' then 4236137 when 'DISCHARGE DIAGNOSIS OF' then 4230359 else 0 END as condition_status_concept_id, 32827 type_concept_id, coalesce(diag_prov_id, '') || ';' || coalesce(diag_prov_taxnmy_id, '') ProviderIdKey from cdm_health_verity_cc_ehr_cce_v2776.emr_diag JOIN {ch_sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND hvid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where upper(coalesce(diag_stat_desc, '')) not in ( 'FAMILY HISTORY OF', 'FAMILY', 'MATERNAL HISTORY OF', 'PATERNAL HISTORY OF', 'FRATERNAL HISTORY OF', 'SORORAL HISTORY OF', 'HISTORY OF', 'OTHER PAST HISTORY' ) and enc_dt is not null order by ch.person_id
